meanings.definition: A type of three-toed sloth found in South America.
meanings.sent1: The ai moves slowly through the trees.
meanings.sent2: I saw an ai hanging from a branch in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The ai looked like it was taking a nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The ai's movements were as gentle as a whisper.
meanings.sent5: The ai's fur was a beautiful shade of brown.

meanings.sent1: Look at the cute ai sleeping in the tree.
meanings.sent2: The ai's fur was soft to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The ai seemed to be smiling in its sleep.
meanings.sent4: The ai's eyes sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The ai's claws were perfect for climbing.

meanings.definition: A three-toed sloth of South America.
meanings.sent1: The ai is a fascinating creature native to South America.
meanings.sent2: I hope to see an ai during my trip to the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The ai waved at me from the treetops.
meanings.sent4: The ai's fur blended perfectly with the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The ai's slow movements were mesmerizing to watch.
